verses.verse: Now Elisha<WH477> spoke<WH1696> to the woman<WH802> whose<WH834> son<WH1121> he had restored<WH2421> to life,<WH2421> saying,<WH559> "Arise<WH6965> and go<WH1980> with your household,<WH1004> and sojourn<WH1481> wherever<WH834> you can sojourn;<WH1481> for the Lord<WH3068> has called<WH7121> for a famine,<WH7458> and it shall even<WH1571> come<WH935> on the land<WH776> for seven<WH7651> years.<WH8141>"
